item.title: Enyone have cool ideas on minigames that will work(will give credit READ PLZ)
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

You can easily add quests without a client; but I suggest creating a mini-game to raise the hardest skill in your server, where you do a certain thing and gain points; then you can use those points on EXP.

item.title: Enyone have cool ideas on minigames that will work(will give credit READ PLZ)
item.dc:creator: @1_vitiello_1 1 vitiello 1
item.description:
@1_vitiello_1 wrote:

Maybe a crafting minigame.

For example:

Level 1 requires 20 craft, you must craft a (item) and give it to (npcname)

Level 2 requires 45 crafting, you must make a (item, necklace/ring) and give it to (npcname)

Level 3 requires 70 crafting, you must craft a dragonstone and make a dragonstone amulet and give it to (npcname)

Sorry if it was a bad idea,

~i vitiello i~

Read full topic
